SQL.LOAD: SELECT file_name, dealer_id, company_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, file_header_id FROM elp_daily_outbound_file_header WHERE file_header_id = :file_header_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_daily_outbound_file_header SET file_name = :file_name, dealer_id = :dealer_id, company_id = :company_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE file_header_id = :file_header_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_daily_outbound_file_header ( file_name, dealer_id, company_id, created_by, file_header_id ) VALUES ( :file_name, :dealer_id, :company_id, :created_by, :file_header_id )
